title: Hero MotoCorp total sales rise 6 pc to 4,88,717 units in August
description: Domestic sales were at 4,72,947 units as compared to 4,50,740 units in August 2022, a growth of 5 per cent, it added. Exports, however, increased to 15,770 units from 11,868 units in the corresponding period of last year.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
